text.section: There is an Ocean City Convention Financing Fund.

section.section: The Ocean City Convention Fund is a continuing, nonlapsing fund that shall be available in perpetuity to implement this subtitle relating to the Ocean City Convention facility.

The Authority shall:
use the Ocean City Convention Fund as a revolving fund for implementing this subtitle relating to the Ocean City Convention facility; and
pay any and all expenses incurred by the Authority concerning the Ocean City Convention facility from the Ocean City Convention Fund.

To the extent considered appropriate by the Authority, the receipts of the Ocean City Convention Fund shall be pledged to and charged with the following relating to the Ocean City Convention facility:
the payment of debt service on Authority bonds;
all reasonable charges and expenses related to Authority borrowing; and
the management of Authority obligations.
The pledge shall be effective as provided in § 10-634 of this subtitle and any applicable Authority provision.
The Treasurer shall invest the money of the Ocean City Convention Fund in the same manner as State funds.
Any investment earnings shall be credited to the Ocean City Convention Fund.
No part of the Ocean City Convention Fund may revert or be credited to the General Fund or any special fund of the State.
